name: FRIDAY NIGHT WASTLAND teaser download
description: So originally this was not suppose to come out until we had 2 weeks done  but we desisted to release the prologue week as a teaser then release the open beta friday night wastland is still coming out hell as you read this we are making it the FNW team is working hard to make this mod this is not the official one this is a "TEASER" soo yeah
